New Records: Scotty Pippen Jr. got his first career triple-double.
Key Match Events: Scotty Pippen Jr. had 11 points, 11 assists, and 10 rebounds.
Rookie Zach Edey had 14 points, eight rebounds, and two blocks.
Kyshawn George scored 17 points to lead the Wizards.
The Grizzlies maintained a lead of at least 20 points through the bulk of the second half.
With 3:50 left in the third and Memphis leading by 24, Zach Edey and Jonas Valanciunas got tangled, resulting in double-technicals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Memphis continues to dominate the paint against its opponents, averaging 60 points a game inside.
